main_definition: To do something three times or to have three of something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To perform an action three times in succession.
meanings_and_examples.example: He tripled his efforts on the project, working late hours every day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having or consisting of three times as much quantity or number.
meanings_and_examples.example: She won a trip that included triple the usual amount of stay for free.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A group or set of three things.
meanings_and_examples.example: They formed a triple threat with their impressive skills in music.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To multiply something by three times the original amount.
meanings_and_examples.example: The company decided to triple its investment in marketing this year.
